snp2.5:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā gayāyaṁ viharati ṭaṅkitamañce sūcilomassa yakkhassa bhavane.
snp2.5:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena kharo ca yakkho sūcilomo ca yakkho bhagavato avidūre atikkamanti.
snp2.5:1.4: Atha kho kharo yakkho sūcilomaṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
snp2.5:1.7: Yāvāhaṁ jānāmi yadi vā so samaṇo, yadi vā so samaṇako”ti.
snp2.5:2.1: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kāyaṁ upanāmesi.
snp2.5:2.3: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp2.5:3.2: Sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṁ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṁ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī”ti.
snp2.5:4.1: “Na khvāhaṁ taṁ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yo me cittaṁ vā khipeyya hadayaṁ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya.
snp2.5:4.2: Api ca tvaṁ, āvuso, puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti.
snp2.5:4.3: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
